name: Gamebox
description:
Gamebox is a free and open source sandbox game centered on user generated content. You decide what you want to play, be it in 3D or 2D, single-player or multiplayer, or create and upload your own games.

Features and content:

* Included are two very basic games in 3D and 2D featuring basic physics to demonstrate how Gamebox can load games

* Single-player and multiplayer games created by the community available in the Steam Workshop

* Create and upload your own games to the Workshop (read the Help section in-game for instructions)

* Both 3D and 2D are supported

* Games may be moddable by using the Workshop

* Some mods on the Workshop may be cross-compatible with multiple Gamebox games

* Made with Godot Engine
